https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/b9D1WtgNk2ULjd2eI0uq4eLynpd.jpg When a video game designer stumbles into a blackmail conspiracy, he clashes with contract killers, Russian mobsters, and compromised cops in a wild journey through the bizarro world of Los Angeles. Uniquely told through a first-person point of view, Burning Dog is a relentless suspense thriller that keeps you guessing until the very end. Burning Dog
